# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Farm Debt Mediation Services
---

**Request Summary**
This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) invites qualified service providers to submit an offer for Farm Debt Mediation Services for a period of four (4) years, commencing upon Standing Offer being issued. The successful offeror(s) will be entrusted to provide mediation services to support farmers facing financial difficulties, facilitating negotiation between farmers and creditors.

**Background**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking to engage a service provider to deliver mediation services under the Farm Debt Mediation Act (FDMA). The proposed service provider will offer a value-added service to farmers and their creditors by providing guidance and facilitating a dialogue between the parties to reach a mutually acceptable agreement. The contract awarded through this RFSO shall be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Bid Requirements**
Potentially successful applicants will be required to furnish services as per the attached Statement of Work for the next four (4) years. The total budget for the Standing Offer will be approximately $637,500, based on a maximum of five (5) stands offers.

The selected successful bidders will first meet AAFC's Pre-Qualification requirements, such as business registration, and liability insurance IDs.

The actual provision, purchase, or delivery of supply or service required to respond to Standing Offer Invitation and documents will be awarded, and, if required, a Contract may be issued through one or more of the numerous procedures set out in various federal, provincial, and territorial authorities.

To place an bid for the said RFSO, applicants are required to register with Canada’s Buy and Sell Web Portal and, once registerered will need to download the instructions for the specific bidding requirements attached hereunder.
